text: Hai is a 2005 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. R. Ramdas, starring Riyaz Khan,Meghna Nair,Jagathy Sreekumar and Indrans in the lead roles. The film was dubbed into Tamil as Unakkaga with additional scenes featuring Tamil actors and it was released in 2008.http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/hai.html ==Cast== *Riyaz Khan as Vinod Kumar/Vishnu Prasad *Meghna Nair as Thriptha *Jagathy Sreekumar as Sekharan *Indrans as Jayapal *Anamika Sivaraj as Arathi *Poornima *Shaju as Anand *Kovai Sarala as Valli *Manivannan as Valli's husband *Charuhasan as Arathi's father *Salim Kumar *Mafia Sasi as Gunda ==References== Category:2005 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Hai (film)
